English: §bThe following nations have been invited to the Berlin Conference.\n§!
§bTogether we can hope to avoid conflict in the division of the continent.\n§!
§YThis will begin a chain of events to divide the regions of Africa.\n§!
§bOur rightful lands lie within the borders of our neighbors! We can chose a dispute and a great power to arbitrate which may be in to our favour. First we must choose the region§!

§bneeds a new administrative capital. Construction will take time, but will provide a local stimulus to our city of choice. This event will picks up to 5 cities with major populations and/or cultural significance.§!
